conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-1 - Deprivation of liberty;Article 5-1-e - Persons of unsound mind);Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8-1 - Respect for private life);Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF X v. FINLAND - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
issue: Sections 8, 17(1),  22b and sub-section 3 of the Mental Health Act
judges: George Nicolaou;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Matti Mikkola;Nebojša Vučinić;Nicolas Bratza;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
